Detailed Description

Functions for approximate inference using Integrated Nested Laplace Approximation (INLA). (UNDER CONSTRUCTION).

These functions perform approximate inference for the posterior where

and is a GMRF.

The routines compute (approximately)

  • the posterior marginal of ,

  • the posterior marginal of for fixed value of ,

  • the posterior marginal of

  • the integrated likelihood for the model

    See also INLA for some more details, and ex_ai for an example.
